apache.conf.parser

Class EnclosureParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • apache.conf.parser.Parser
      • apache.conf.parser.EnclosureParser

  • public class EnclosureParser
extends Parser
    This class is used to parse the Apache configuration and obtain enclosures.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class apache.conf.parser.Parser

        rootConfFile, serverRoot, sharedModules, staticModules

    • Method Detail

      • extractEnclosureToParts

        public static String[] extractEnclosureToParts(String line)

        Takes in an enclosure and puts it into parts

        Example: "" will be split into "VirtualHost" "80"

        Parameters:
        line - the line with parts to extract
        Returns:
        an array with the directive parts

      • getEnclosure

        public Enclosure[] getEnclosure(String enclosureType,
                       boolean includeVHosts)
                         throws Exception

        Parses all active configuration files for the enclosure specified by enclosureType.

        For example if you search for "VirtualHost" this function will return all VirtualHosts in the configuration.

        Parameters:
        enclosureType - The enclosure name. This is not case sensitive.
        includeVHosts - flag to indicate whether to include enclosures in VirtualHosts
        Returns:
        An array with all matching enclosures.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • deleteEnclosure

        public void deleteEnclosure(String enclosureType,
                   Pattern matchesValuePattern,
                   boolean commentOut,
                   boolean includeVHosts)
                     throws Exception
        Removes all Enclosures from the active configuration that match the enclosure type and enclosure value pattern.
        Parameters:
        enclosureType - The enclosure name. This is not case sensitive.
        matchesValuePattern - The pattern to match the enclosure value against
        commentOut - true to comment out the matching enclosure, false to remove the enclosure
        includeVHosts - boolean indicating whether to search for enclosures inside virtual hosts
        Throws:
        Exception
